description: You may be eligible for free and discounted travel with concessions or Zip Oyster cards

texts: You may be eligible for free and discounted travel on our transport services

cards.title: Children under 5 travel free
texts: Children under 5 travel free with a fare paying adult - check your fare

cards.title: 5-10 Zip Oyster photocard
texts: All children aged between 5-10 travel for free on our transport services

cards.title: 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard
texts: Free travel on buses and trams, and discounts on our transport services

cards.title: 16+ Zip Oyster photocard
texts: Free and discounted travel on all our transport services if you're 16 or over

cards.title: Rules of travel for under 18s
texts: How to travel safely across our transport services if you're under 18

cards.title: Travel for schools
texts: Free off-peak travel when you register for our School Party Travel Scheme

cards.title: 18+ Student Oyster photocard
texts: Discounted travel if you're 18 or over and studying or on a work placement in London

cards.title: Apprentice Oyster photocard
texts: Discounted travel if you're 18 or over and in the first year of an apprenticeship

cards.title: 60+ London Oyster photocard
texts: Free travel if you're 60 or over and living in London

cards.title: Freedom Pass
texts: Free and discounted travel if you're 66 or have a disability and live in London

cards.title: Veterans Oyster photocard
texts: Free and discounted travel for eligible veterans on our transport services

cards.title: National Railcard Discount
texts: Discounted travel on our transport services

cards.title: Annual Gold Card discounts
texts: Discounts off your travel when you buy an Annual Travelcard

cards.title: Bus & Tram Discount
texts: Discounted travel on our buses and trams

cards.title: Jobcentre Plus Travel Discount
texts: Discounted travel if you're unemployed and looking for work in London
